reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Support Programme for Infrastructure Sector Strategies and Alternative Financing (SISSAF)

description.narrative: The objective of this programme is to improve both the efficiency and effectiveness of service delivery in the Lebanese infrastructure sectors i.e. water, energy and land transport.

title.narrative: Status of Medium Term Expenditure Frameworks (MTEFs) in three pilot ministries

description.narrative: Status of Medium Term Expenditure Frameworks (MTEFs) in three pilot ministries

title.narrative: Status of Medium Term Expenditure Frameworks (MTEFs) in three pilot ministries

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: No MTEFs in the three pilot ministries

comment.narrative: No MTEFs in the three pilot ministries

target.value: MTEFS developed in three pilot ministries

comment.narrative: MTEFS developed in three pilot ministries

actual.value: pilot MTEFs for the three pilot ministries prepared
